data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
In the same line that Net::FTPServer provides an FTP server from
    within a Perl program, Net::HTTPServer allows you to easily embed a
    light weight pure perl based web server. I've used this to write a
    few stand alone applications that you can point a web browser at and
    interact with it. These have then been distributed within a software
    package without requiring a full web server at the remote sites.
    Just my script.
